body:
wannier 90 fail to build with numerous REAL/COMPLEX type mismatch errors on gcc-10.3.0/gentoo. Quick google check shows numerous reports on compilation failures with gcc 10, see for example https://github.com/Unidata/netcdf-fortran/issues/212

The general consensus seems to suppress the error message with -fallow-argument-mismatch  compiler flag for existing projects
title: Installation issue: generic gcc 10 fortran build error, exposed by wannier90
